articles.title: New Orleans Rebounds After Attack and Biden's Environmental Agenda Takes Shape
articles.description: The article covers US domestic news, highlighting New Orleans' resilience after a deadly vehicle attack. It discusses Biden's planned ban on offshore drilling, the legacy of alcohol warnings under Trump, award ceremonies by Biden, and political tensions concerning Trump's legal troubles and Republicans' internal conflicts.

articles.title: Billionaire Investor Bill Ackman Thinks 2 Stocks Could Soar Roughly 900% Under the Incoming Trump Administration
articles.description: President-elect Donald Trump has made many investors bullish on the market, which has been on an incredible two-year run. Not surprisingly, billionaire investor Bill Ackman, a vocal Trump supporter, is all aboard this train. Ackman and his fund Pershing Square Holdings have delivered extraordinary gains over the last five years.
